personal.name: Vishesh Tiwari
personal.title: Full Stack Java Developer
about: Experienced IT professional with 6+ years of work experience seeking a position as Full stack developer. Offering expertise in Java, Spring Boot/MVC, React and AWS.

I am passionate about creating efficient, scalable applications and have a strong background in both frontend and backend development. My experience spans across various technologies including Java ecosystem, modern JavaScript frameworks, and cloud platforms.

achievements: Working on Ad Tech platform for targeted advertising solutions
Developing scalable microservices for real-time ad serving and optimization
Implementing data-driven advertising algorithms and analytics
Contributing to high-performance systems handling millions of ad requests
Developed Promo Central Application for creating and managing diverse types of promotions in a generic way
Optimized search functionality to handle millions of records efficiently
Implemented CI/CD pipeline using Jenkins and Docker for automated deployments
Worked on microservices architecture using Spring Boot and AWS services
Enhanced operation teams experience for tracking transactions and generating reports
Developed Spring Batch application for processing large volumes of records
Implemented AWS CDK for Infrastructure as Code deployment
Created notification systems using AWS SQS, Lambda, and CloudWatch
Developed web-based application to find and manage active mainframe jobs
Implemented advanced search functionality with multiple filter options
Created automated testing solutions using HP LeanFT
Worked on Java EE 8 applications with Spring Boot and Bootstrap

general.question: What's Vishesh's work experience?
general.answer: Vishesh has 6+ years of professional experience as a Full Stack Java Developer. He currently works as a Senior Software Engineer at Target in Ad Tech, previously worked at Lowe's, Principal Global Services and TCS. His career spans across various domains including advertising technology, retail, financial services, and consulting.

general.question: What's his current role?
general.answer: Currently, Vishesh works as a Senior Software Engineer at Target, where he develops Ad Tech platform solutions for targeted advertising, real-time ad serving, and optimization using Java, Spring Boot, and AWS technologies.

general.question: Tell me about his education
general.answer: Vishesh holds an MCA (Master of Computer Applications) from Kamla Nehru Institute of Technology (KNIT) and a B.Sc in Mathematics/Chemistry from CSJM University, Kanpur.

general.question: How can I contact him?
general.answer: You can reach Vishesh at vishesh.tiwari813@gmail.com, connect on LinkedIn (https://www.linkedin.com/in/vishesh-tiwari-448222146/), or check his GitHub (https://github.com/Vishesh813). He's open to new opportunities!

technical.question: What technologies does he know?
technical.answer: Vishesh is skilled in Java, Spring Boot, React, AWS, Microservices, Docker, Jenkins, and more. He has expertise in both frontend and backend development, with strong knowledge of cloud technologies and DevOps practices.

technical.question: What projects has he worked on?
technical.answer: Vishesh has worked on several major projects including Ad Tech Platform at Target, Promo Central Application at Lowe's, Transaction Tracking Systems, Spring Batch Processing applications, and Mainframe Jobs Management systems. His projects focus on scalable, enterprise-level solutions.

technical.question: What's his Java expertise?
technical.answer: Vishesh has deep expertise in Java ecosystem including Spring Boot, Spring MVC, Microservices architecture, RESTful APIs, and enterprise application development. He has worked on large-scale Java applications serving millions of users.

technical.question: Tell me about his cloud experience
technical.answer: Vishesh has extensive experience with AWS services including Lambda, SQS, CloudWatch, and CDK. He has implemented Infrastructure as Code and worked on cloud-native applications with serverless architectures.

career.question: What are his achievements?
career.answer: Vishesh has received multiple recognitions including Star Performer awards, client appreciation certificates, and has been recognized for his technical contributions and leadership in various projects.

career.question: Where is he located?
career.answer: Vishesh is based in India and has experience working with global teams across different time zones.

career.question: What's his leadership experience?
career.answer: Vishesh has led technical teams, mentored junior developers, and has been responsible for architectural decisions in multiple projects. He has experience in code reviews, technical planning, and cross-functional collaboration.

career.question: Why should I hire him?
career.answer: Vishesh brings 6+ years of proven experience, strong technical skills, leadership capabilities, and a track record of delivering scalable solutions. He's passionate about technology, continuously learning, and has consistently received recognition for his contributions.

seo.title: Vishesh Tiwari - Full Stack Java Developer | 6+ Years Experience
seo.description: Experienced Full Stack Java Developer with 6+ years at Lowe's, Principal Global Services, and TCS. Expert in Java, Spring Boot, React, AWS, and Microservices.
